lib.constants module¶

lib.pipeline module¶

Responsible for the who NER pipeline - post-correction - modernisation - ner

class lib.pipeline.Pipeline(berts_to_initialize, project)¶

Bases: object

Contains the whole ner pipeline logic

__call__(input_string, steps=None)¶

Returns dict with a shape according to lib.schema (format.schema.json) Depending on which parts of the pipeline are called, the required input and expected output will be different.

__init__(berts_to_initialize, project)¶

Initialize self. See help(type(self)) for accurate signature.

lib.schema module¶

Verify integrity of the json schema
